name: Mahjong Ultimate
description:
The ancient solitaire Mahjong game at it's finest! Match all the tiles and clear the board.

Choose from a gaggle of backgrounds, tilesets, and layouts. Ask the computer to reveal the best moves. Backup moves and retry the same game different ways. Play guaranteed winnable or totally random games. Keep track of your playing time and other game stats.

WARNING: This game is addictive!

Features:

* 51 layouts to play
* Over 20 different backgrounds
* Themed tilesets:
* Classic Mahjong
* Alphabet
* Animals
* Bugs
* Fish
* Games
* Music
* Plants
* Technology
* Weather
* Computer hints feature
* Backup moves button
* Soothing soundtrack
